name: House Music Radio EDM Dance Tunes
name_original: House Music Radio EDM Dance Tunes
description:
***UPDATED MUSIC LIST***
This app is a must for EDM House Music Lovers!

Listen live to the latest and best house music from around the world - all in one convenient place. Listen to different genres of music from your favourite House/EDM artists like Calvin Harris, Skrillex, Diplo, Hardwell, Tiesto, Armin Van Buuren, Avicii, Alesso, Nicky Romero, Sebastian Ingresso, Axwell, Van Helden, David Guetta, Afrojack, Skrillex, Deadmau5, Swedish House Mafia, Basshunter, Steve Aoki, and more!

**FEATURES**
- Apple TV integration
- Background play and control
- Ability to pause music
- Song data and controls shows on lock screen
- Share the House Music Radio love with Twitter, Facebook,Email, SMS and Youtube integration
- Last.fm integration let's you see the song name, artist name and album cover while you're listening.
- Dedicated House, Club and Dance music channels with everything from Electro, Garage, Progressive, Drum and Bass, Techno, Old School House, Amsterdam, Ibiza, World Music, Deep House etc


Have a request for a station or a specific house music genre or station or want something added to the app? Then send us a tweet or a Facebook message at: http://www.facebook.com/housemusicradio123
http://www.twitter.com/housemusicradioza

If you enjoy the app, please leave us a review, we appreciate the feedback!
